column4:
Stylish, contemporary look sofa with an elegant, classic shape with bolster cushions. 
Seat cushions have a fibre wrap on shape-retaining foam for added comfort and support. 
Fabric options have reversible cushions and the feet are solid birch finished with a dark stain. 
The arms are removable for ease of delivery. Images displayed here act as a guide and may not be representative of the finished item. 
Fabrics are overlayed onto model images, so actual seams and pattern match may differ from what is shown. 
Dimensions: Mattress- L178 x W132 x D5cm, Height: 90 cm, Height In: 35.4 in, Width: 218 cm, Width In: 85.8 in, Depth: 103 cm, Depth In: 40.6 in, Seat Height: 51 cm, Arm Height: 71 cm, Top back Rail Height: 76 cm, Feet Height: 9 cm, C Dimension: 66 cm, Length of Recliner: 235 cm,
Item details: 99% of our upholstery is manufactured in the UK, Back cushions are made up of polyester fibre,Can have armcaps- yes, 
Feet are solid hardwood with a medium finish, Includes bolster cushions 2 fibre and feather-filled arm bolsters, 
More information: Our delivery team will unpack and position in a room of your choice for free, Mattress Type: SPRUNG
